text: (Nushi kara) hitotsu no shirushi ga kare-ra ni yattekureba,`arrā no shito-tachi ni atae rareta yōna mono ga, watashi-tachi ni kudaru made wa shinjinaidearou.' To iu. Arrā wa doko de (mata ikaga ni) kare no shimei o hatasubeki ka o, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Yagate tsumibukaimono wa, sono (shidekashita) subete no sakubō ni taishite, arrā no omoto de kutsujoku to tsūretsuna kei o ukerudearou
